TopicTitle: Weapons and Aerobatics with B9 and FAR

Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

This is my first post on the forums (hopefully I'm in the right section) with my first KSP video.

I had lots of fun controllably stalling out airplanes with Ferram Aerospace Research so I decided to make a video about it.

Tell me what you think! I might edit and upload more KSP footage that I have if the feedback is pleasant
This should go in fan works, but nice vid.

Oh okay, I thought that section was more for stories, art and animations without using the game engine and this one about in-game videos.

Should this thread be deleted/moved then (if that's possible at all)? Or can it stay here?
